name: 3D Halloween Maze
description:
ROLL UP, ROLL UP,  IN THE NIGHT OF HALLOWEEN COME AND EXPERIMENT REAL DANGER, AND BRAVELY FACE A WILD AND FIERCE MONSTER WHILE WANDERING IN AN INEXTRICABLE LABYRINTH. THE MANAGEMENT IS RELIEVED FROM ANY RESPONSIBILITY.  THIS IS NOT FOR THE FAINT HEARTED...

Relive the classic gameplay from 1981 game 3D Monster Maze in this spiritual sequel, with new enanchements and creepy Halloween characters!
A single line of text every few seconds will be your only way to keep track of the movements of the Monster while you hopelessly roam in the Maze. 

But the Maze is also home to other creatures that may help you or... not. 

With ghosts, witches, skeletons and pumpkins, are you ready for the ultimate Halloween attraction?
